THE ACME MACHINE & WELDING COMPANY v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 42421. Decided May 4, 1936] *332Mr. Oooper B. Rhodes for the plaintiff. Mr. Fred B. Rhodes was on the brief. Mr. Frank J. Keating, with whom was Mr. Assistant Attorney General James W. Morris, for the defendant.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
